sentences.english: Soon, the Civil Administration was renamed the northern part of Guangdong Shaoguan area.
sentences.chinese: 不久，粵北行政公署改稱韶關專區。

sentences.english: After the founding of New China, to the Civil Administration formed.
sentences.chinese: 新中國成立後，以行政公署建制。

sentences.english: The local administrative office is a representative department of the provincial government.
sentences.chinese: 本地區的行政公署是省政府的派出機關。
